node.excerpt: So it’s the new year and I’ve finally decided to start a blog. Let’s see how this goes.

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and
Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in…

Wow! I love blogging so much already. Did you know that “despite its name, salted duck eggs can also be made from
